greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of the (finite) value of Sum_{ k >= 1, k has only a single zero digit in base 2 } 1/k.
comment: The sum of 1/n where n has a single 0 in base 2.
link: Robert Baillie, Summing The Curious Series Of Kempner And Irwin, arXiv:0806.4410 [math.CA], 2008-2015.
mathematica: (* first install irwinSums.m, see reference, then *) First@ RealDigits@ iSum[0, 1, 111, 2] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Aug 03 2010 *)
xref: Cf. A030130 (numbers with a single zero in base 2), A140502.
results.author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, May 15 2009
